column1: * 1900 - Author and philosopher Friedrich Nietzche dies.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Glyn Daniel
* 1974 - Mythcon 5 at wikipedia:Scripps College in wikipedia:Claremont
* 1988 - The Return of the Shadow is published in the United Kingdom.

column2: a special set of The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game

column1: * 2006 - The Oxford Tolkien Conference at wikipedia:Exeter College
* 2007 - The Tolkien Societys Australian Seminar 2007 in Sydney
* 2010 - A middle English vocabulary (2010) is published.
